name: spem-player
description: Helping singers learn Thomas Tallis Spem in alium

scripts.concat:js: mkdir -p dist/js && concat -o dist/js/scripts.js src/classes.js src/barlines.temp src/spem.js
scripts.build:css: npm run scss && npm run autoprefixer && npm run cssmin
scripts.build:js: npm run barlines && npm run concat:js
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
